title: How do I set a screen unlock PIN?
answer:
1. Choose Settings > Privacy & security > Security > Screen security > Screen lock and touch PIN. 

 1. Under Input your PIN, enter a PIN. 

 1. Enter the PIN again and touch OK. 

 [When you power on your phone or press the power button to turn on the screen, the unlock screen is displayed by default. You can then enter the PIN to unlock the screen.]()
